Body: My samsung galaxy s2 is locked, after restart, I see following welcome screen onlyHere was my fault :(Exceed to many pattern attemptsThen system asked for associated google account and password. Lack of internet connection I was failed to  login.Then restart the galaxy sII by thinking that I would have chance to give pattern one moreBut no lack I see ' S(logo) Samsung Galaxy SII ' on screen. I can not nothing to forwardPlease helpThanks
Title: Unlock samsung galaxy s2 too many pattern attempts and failed to login in gmail account then reset

history.Text: My samsung galaxy s2 is locked, after restart, I see following welcome screen only![enter image description here][1]  Here was my fault :(1. Exceed to many pattern attempts2. Then system asked for associated google account and password. Lack of internet connection I was failed to  login.3. Then restart the galaxy sII by thinking that I would have chance to give pattern one more4. But no lack I see ' S(logo) Samsung Galaxy SII ' on screen. I can not nothing to forwardPlease helpThanks  [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/ANa7b.png
Unlock samsung galaxy s2 too many pattern attempts and failed to login in gmail account then reset
